attributes.action: Take away the rights of Prisoners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the jail the Prisoners have more rights than the officers.  We I think are the only country that does this.  We need to get tougher in the jails to deter anyone.  It is far too much of a holiday camp and get far more opportunities than the rest of us!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
